m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Small-Scale Solar Projects Now Account For Over Half Of Construction February 19th, 2014 by Joshua S Hill   According to a new report from NPD Solarbuzz, solar PV projects ranging in size from 250 kilowatts (kW) to 5 megawatts (MW) now account for almost half of the 4,300 projects currently under construction across leading PV countries. The latest NPD Solarbuzz  Global Deal Tracker  report details the collective downstream project activity in leading and emerging PV markets across the world, released each month.
